Charles Howells? ZZ-2 Anne Howells 1796 1800 Penallt Nr.Monmouth, Wales Llandaff, Wales March 18, 1873 April 12, 1862 Cwmbran, Wales Cwmbran, Wales Innkeeper, Halfway Inn Cwmbran, 1850-1873 Charles and Anne are buried at Llantarnam Church Sarah Howells 1829 Charles Howells 1830 Bristol David Howells 1831 Monmouth, Wales Febuary 4, 1834 Monmouth, Wales James (aka David) Howells April 12, 1833 Monmouth, Wales Catherine Howells 1837 Monmouth, Wales Married Henry Thomas Son Henry (1870) Hannah Howells 1838 Monmouth, Wales May 12, 1861 Married William Whittaker Mary Ann Howells 1840, Monmouth Elizabeth Howells 1841, Monmouth 1861, Llantarnam, Wales Buried Llantarnam Church Thomas Howells B-2 1844, Monmouth November 13, 1896 Llantarnam, Wales High Street Abersychan Trevethin Innkeeper 1881-1885 Dorallt Mawr Inn, Henllys Innkeeper 1885-1896 Mount Pleasant Inn, Cwmbran

Thomas and Delia Howells� B-2.

Thomas Howells A-2 Delia Howells (nee Williams) (1867-1869 Davies) 1844, Monmouth April 6, 1848 High Street Abersychan Trevethin Pontnewynydd Gwent November 13, 1896 October 18, 1936 Cwmbran Llantarnam Church, Wales Innkeeper PHOTO of Delia (the mother) PHOTO of Delia and all the kids PHOTO of 7 daughters News item from the 1948 South Wales Weekly Argus PHOTO of daughter Delia News item from the 1953 South Wales Weekly Argus Emily 1866 1962 (Emily is a daughter from Delia's first marriage to E. Davies who died 1869.) Elizabeth Ann Howells 1871 Llantarnam, Wales 1949 Portishead, Wales Married Mr. Drain 1902, daughter Delia Delia Howells 1873 Llantarnam, Wales 1963 Newport, Wales Married George Barrett one son remarried James Reynolds Bailey Street, Newport Thomas Charles Howells C-2 August 10, 1875 Bell Public House Abersychan Pontypool, Monmouth, Wales June 17, 1958 Edmonton, Alberta Charles Howells 1877 Bell Public House Abersychan, Wales 1917, killed in action, France Married to Greta 2 daughters Marie and Greta Marie married Ben Jones, brother of David Jones (see Ada Howells), daughter Mary Amelia Hannah Howells May 16, 1879 Bell Public House Abersychan, Wales 1896 PHOTO of Amelia June 19, 1965 buried with parents Llantarnam Wales Married to Fredrick Williams Kate (aka Kitty) Howells 1881 Dorallt Inn, Henllys Wales 1951 Milman Street, Newport, Wales Married Walter Griffiths sons, Walter & Reginald Ada Howells September 28, 1883 Dorallt Inn, Henllys, Wales 1970 Cwmbran, Wales Married Edward Nicholas 6 children; Sons, Edward, Ivor, and William who was killed in a plane crash with David Jones brother of Ben Jones (see Charles Howells), Daughter Nancy first married David Jones, later remarried to Arthur Peterson. other 2 daughters, Millicent and Delia Rose Howells 1885 Dorallt Inn, Henllys, Wales 1955 South Africa Married Mr. Ballantyne Imigrated to South Africa Sons Howell, Howard, Robert daughter Rose Anne William Howells 1887 Mount Pleasant Inn, Cwmbran Wales 1961 Emigrated to South Africa Married Evelyn, 2 sons Neville, Norman Maud Howells 1889 Mount Pleasant Inn, Cwmbran Wales Married Francis Gelli Chappell she lived past 1984 one son Francis Gelli 4 daughters, Doreen, Evelyn (Bill), Marjorie, Olive (Ken) Albert David Howells February, 1891 Mount Pleasant Inn, Cwmbran Wales June 1891 (age 4 months) buried with parents Llantarnam Church, Cwmbran
